title: 4 Tips to Know Before You Go to Machu Picchu Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: The sacred Inca site of Machu Picchu in Peru is on most travelers’ bucket list and with the abundance of affordable flights popping up this year many have been able to make their dream of visiting the site come true.
